p: This study is designed as a double-blind placebo-control RCT to be performed in nondiabetic patients with both colorectal ACF and resectable polyps. It will be conducted in the Department of Gastroenterology and Hepatology at Yokohama City University (YCU) Hospital. The coordinating office will be at the YCU Hospital, and registration and data collection will be conducted at the YCU center for novel and exploratory clinical trials (Y-NEXT).
